trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> PKCS #1 1.5 版签名。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to create a digital signature using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于创建数字签名使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>算法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter> to verify digital signatures with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter>来验证数字签名与<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>算法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the key and hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetKey%2A>并<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>设置在调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>之前的密钥和哈希算法</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter"></xref> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter"></xref>与指定的键的类。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 用于<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>设置在调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>之前的哈希算法</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm that holds the private key.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref>包含私钥的算法。

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: Creates the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> PKCS #1 signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref>指定数据的 PKCS #1 签名。

trans-unit.source: You must specify a key and a hash algorithm before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，必须指定一个键和哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 要进行签名的数据。

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for rgbHash.
trans-unit.target: 数字签名 rgbHash 。

trans-unit.source: The key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The hash algorithm is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-的哈希算法是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The rgbHash parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rgbHash parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Sets the hash algorithm to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: 设置要用于创建签名的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: You must set a hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>之前，必须设置哈希算法

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: 要用于创建签名的哈希算法名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the private key to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: 设置要用于创建签名的私钥。

trans-unit.source: You must set a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>之前，必须设置密钥

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm that holds the private key.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref>包含私钥的算法。

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .
